title: QA Engineer - ASE
summary: The Apple Services Engineering (ASE) QA team are looking for an experienced QA Engineer to help test the features and services which power App Store, Apple Music, TV+ and Podcasts services. You’ll be joining a hardworking team of QA engineers who share a real passion for testing and care deeply about the quality of Apple products, with a strong focus on customer experience. Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming great products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what can be accomplished!
description: You will be working alongside like-minded QA engineers testing features and services which power the App Store, Apple Music, TV+ and Podcasts. You'll be expected to take end-to-end responsibility of test execution including: Test planning, execution and reporting Development, implementation & triage automated tests & frameworks. Work collaboratively with engineers and project managers in cross functional project teams. To thrive in this role you will need to be ambitious, detail orientated, with proven experience of building and implementing test automation and be comfortable working in a dynamic environment with rapidly changing priorities. You will also need strong interpersonal and communication skills and a willingness to work as a team player.
preferred_qualifications: Experience testing API services, Web UI and Devices. Self-motivated with proven ability to lead QA projects and contribute as part of team. Strong written and oral communication skills.
